thread.title: Kevin Olsen, brother of Panthers' Greg Olsen, arrested on rape charges
thread.title_full: Kevin Olsen, brother of Panthers' Greg Olsen, arrested on rape charges

author: Joe Rodgers (joseph.rodgers@peformgroup.com)
title: Kevin Olsen, brother of Panthers' Greg Olsen, arrested on rape charges
text:
38pm  38pm EST American Football, News, English, NFL, NCAA Division I FBS Olsen, a quarterback at the University of North Carolina at Charlotte, was arrested Sunday afternoon on allegations of sexual assault. Kevin Olsen  38  38 p.m. ET 
University of North Carolina at Charlotte quarterback Kevin Olsen, the brother of Panthers tight end Greg Olsen, was arrested Sunday on allegations of sexual assault. 
Charlotte-Mecklenburg Police records show Olsen was arrested at 4:43 p.m. on charges of second-degree forcible rape, cyberstalking, assault on female and second degree force sex offense. 
Olsen, who has one year of eligibility remaining, has been suspended from UNCC pending a further investigation, according to a statement released by the school . 
The assault occurred off-campus and was â€œwithin an existing relationship," the school said. 
A four-star recruit out of high school, Olsen was suspended from the University of Miami football program in 2014 after he was charged with driving under the influence and having a fake or stolen driver's license. Watch This
